name: df-lub
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4
body: |- wceq(club, cmpt(s0, universe, cres(cmpt(s1, cpw(cfv(cbs, cv(s0))), crio(s2, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), wa(wral(s3, cv(s1), wbr(cv(s3), cfv(cple, cv(s0)), cv(s2))), wral(s4, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), wi(wral(s3, cv(s1), wbr(cv(s3), cfv(cple, cv(s0)), cv(s4))), wbr(cv(s2), cfv(cple, cv(s0)), cv(s4))))))), cab(s1, wreu(s2, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), wa(wral(s3, cv(s1), wbr(cv(s3), cfv(cple, cv(s0)), cv(s2))), wral(s4, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), wi(wral(s3, cv(s1), wbr(cv(s3), cfv(cple, cv(s0)), cv(s4))), wbr(cv(s2), cfv(cple, cv(s0)), cv(s4))))))))))
bodyPretty: ‚ä¢ lub =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶((s1 ‚àà P((Base ` s0))‚Ü¶ iota(s2 ‚àà(Base ` s0),(‚àÄ(s3 ‚àà s1, s3[(le ` s0)]s2)‚àß ‚àÄ(s4 ‚àà(Base ` s0),(‚àÄ(s3 ‚àà s1, s3[(le ` s0)]s4)‚Üí s2[(le ` s0)]s4)))))|` { s1 | ‚àÉ!(s2 ‚àà(Base ` s0),(‚àÄ(s3 ‚àà s1, s3[(le ` s0)]s2)‚àß ‚àÄ(s4 ‚àà(Base ` s0),(‚àÄ(s3 ‚àà s1, s3[(le ` s0)]s4)‚Üí s2[(le ` s0)]s4))))}))
comment: Define the least upper bound (LUB) of a set of (poset) elements. The domain is restricted to exclude sets ` s ` for which the LUB doesn't exist uniquely. (Contributed by NM, 12-Sep-2011.) (Revised by NM, 6-Sep-2018.)
